short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A pop-up to access the Google apps teachers need, quickly. This extension takes up less real estate than individual icons.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Google School Toolbox is an extension allows you to access Google Workplace apps quickly. When you click the extension, links to the Google Apps students need the most will appear so you can access them quickly from any page.
